# backgroundColor

**Instance Property**

The background color of the scene.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var backgroundColor: UIColor { get set }
```

```swift
@MainActor var backgroundColor: NSColor { get set }
```

```swift
var backgroundColor: UIColor { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is a gray color (RGBA `0.15, 0.15, 0.15, 1.0)`.

## Setting the Background Appearance

- **Creating a Scene with a Transparent Background**: Set a transparent background color to show the content of the views below.
- **view**: The view that is currently presenting the scene.
